email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Iron Ore - Santos to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

I hope this message finds you well.

We are pleased to offer a freight quote for the shipment of 85,000MT of Iron Ore from Santos to Qingdao under CIF terms. Our initial freight quote is $22.50 per metric ton.

The vessel we propose is the MV OCEAN PRIDE, which has a DWT of 180,000 and LOA of 290m. The laycan is set for 2023-10-20 to 2023-10-25. Please let us know your thoughts and if you have any specific requirements.

Best regards,
Alex Turner
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore - Santos to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thank you for the quote. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market levels. We are looking to secure a competitive rate for this shipment and potentially future shipments.

Could you review the rate and possibly offer a discount? Also, could you provide the demurrage rate per day?

Best regards,
Sarah Connor
Charterers Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore - Santos to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

Thank you for your prompt response. Considering your feedback, we can offer a revised rate of $21.75 per metric ton. The demurrage rate will be $15,000 per day.

Please confirm if this meets your requirements and if you need any further details on the laycan or loading window.

Best regards,
Alex Turner
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore - Santos to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thank you for the revised quote. The rate of $21.75 per metric ton is more in line with our expectations. However, we need to ensure that the laytime is sufficient. Could you confirm the laytime start and end dates?

Best regards,
Sarah Connor
Charterers Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore - Santos to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

The laytime will start on 2023-10-20 and end on 2023-10-25. We can offer a laytime of 5 days with the demurrage rate of $15,000 per day thereafter.

Please confirm if these terms are acceptable.

Best regards,
Alex Turner
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore - Santos to Qingdao - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

We are satisfied with the terms and the laytime period. Please proceed with the necessary arrangements.

Best regards,
Sarah Connor
Charterers Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore - Santos to Qingdao - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

Thank you for your confirmation. We will proceed with the arrangements and keep you updated on the progress.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Alex Turner
Maritime Brokers
